languages.text: "Кстати о шаттлах — зафрахтованное нами судно позорно покинуло орбиту, поэтому я вынужден обратиться к вам с просьбой. Возьмите мой отряд на борт флагмана — мы сойдем на любом мире или станции, где есть пустотный корабль. Мы не можем умереть здесь, пока похититель десятины разгуливает на свободе".

"Speaking of shuttles, the ship we hired has turned tail and left orbit, so I must turn to you with a request: take my squad aboard, and we will disembark on the first world or station with access to a voidship. We cannot die here while whoever stole the tithe is enjoying their freedom."
languages.original_text: "Кстати о шаттлах — зафрахтованное нами судно позорно покинуло орбиту, поэтому я вынужден обратиться к вам с просьбой. Возьмите мой отряд на борт флагмана — мы сойдем на любом мире или станции, где есть пустотный корабль. Мы не можем умереть здесь, пока похититель десятины разгуливает на свободе".

traits.locale_text: "Speaking of shuttles, the ship we hired has turned tail and left orbit, so I must turn to you with a request: take my squad aboard, and we will disembark on the first world or station with access to a voidship. We cannot die here while whoever stole the tithe is enjoying their freedom."

"Speaking of shuttles, the ship we hired has turned tail and left orbit, so I must turn to you with a request: take my squad aboard, and we will disembark on the first world or station with access to a voidship. We cannot die here while whoever stole the tithe is enjoying their freedom."

"Speaking of shuttles, the ship we hired has turned tail and left orbit, so I must turn to you with a request: take my squad aboard, and we will disembark on the first world or station with access to a voidship. We cannot die here while whoever stole the tithe is enjoying their freedom."

"Speaking of shuttles, the ship we hired has turned tail and left orbit, so I must turn to you with a request: take my squad aboard, and we will disembark on the first world or station with access to a voidship. We cannot die here while whoever stole the tithe is enjoying their freedom."

"Speaking of shuttles, the ship we hired has turned tail and left orbit, so I must turn to you with a request: take my squad aboard, and we will disembark on the first world or station with access to a voidship. We cannot die here while whoever stole the tithe is enjoying their freedom."

"Speaking of shuttles, the ship we hired has turned tail and left orbit, so I must turn to you with a request: take my squad aboard, and we will disembark on the first world or station with access to a voidship. We cannot die here while whoever stole the tithe is enjoying their freedom."

languages.text: "Apropos Shuttle. Das Schiff, das wir rekrutiert hatten, ist geflohen und hat den Orbit verlassen. Ich muss Euch also um etwas bitten: Nehmt meinen Trupp an Bord. Wir werden Euer Schiff auf der ersten Welt oder Station mit Zugang zu einem Raumschiff wieder verlassen. Wir dürfen hier nicht sterben, während die Diebe des Zehnts ihre Freiheit genießen."
languages.original_text: "Speaking of shuttles, the ship we hired has turned tail and left orbit, so I must turn to you with a request: take my squad aboard, and we will disembark on the first world or station with access to a voidship. We cannot die here while whoever stole the tithe is enjoying their freedom."

traits.locale_text: "Apropos Shuttle. Das Schiff, das wir rekrutiert hatten, ist geflohen und hat den Orbit verlassen. Ich muss Euch also um etwas bitten: Nehmt meinen Trupp an Bord. Wir werden Euer Schiff auf der ersten Welt oder Station mit Zugang zu einem Raumschiff wieder verlassen. Wir dürfen hier nicht sterben, während die Diebe des Zehnts ihre Freiheit genießen."

languages.text: « En parlant de navettes, le vaisseau que nous avions emprunté a fait demi-tour et quitté l'orbite. Je me vois donc contraint de vous demander d'embarquer mon escouade à votre bord. Nous vous quitterons sur le premier monde ou la première station ayant accès à un croiseur stellaire. Nous ne pouvons pas mourir ici quand celui ou celle qui a volé la dîme profite de sa liberté. »
languages.original_text: "Speaking of shuttles, the ship we hired has turned tail and left orbit, so I must turn to you with a request: take my squad aboard, and we will disembark on the first world or station with access to a voidship. We cannot die here while whoever stole the tithe is enjoying their freedom."

traits.locale_text: « En parlant de navettes, le vaisseau que nous avions emprunté a fait demi-tour et quitté l'orbite. Je me vois donc contraint de vous demander d'embarquer mon escouade à votre bord. Nous vous quitterons sur le premier monde ou la première station ayant accès à un croiseur stellaire. Nous ne pouvons pas mourir ici quand celui ou celle qui a volé la dîme profite de sa liberté. »

languages.text: «Y hablando de lanzaderas, la nave que contratamos nos ha dejado tirados y ha abandonado la órbita, así que me veo en la tesitura de pedirle un favor: admita a mi escuadra a bordo de su navío, y desembarcaremos en el primer mundo o estación donde podamos conseguir otra nave del vacío. No moriremos aquí mientras el ladrón del diezmo disfruta de su libertad».
languages.original_text: "Speaking of shuttles, the ship we hired has turned tail and left orbit, so I must turn to you with a request: take my squad aboard, and we will disembark on the first world or station with access to a voidship. We cannot die here while whoever stole the tithe is enjoying their freedom."

traits.locale_text: «Y hablando de lanzaderas, la nave que contratamos nos ha dejado tirados y ha abandonado la órbita, así que me veo en la tesitura de pedirle un favor: admita a mi escuadra a bordo de su navío, y desembarcaremos en el primer mundo o estación donde podamos conseguir otra nave del vacío. No moriremos aquí mientras el ladrón del diezmo disfruta de su libertad».

languages.text: “说到穿梭机，我们雇佣的飞船已经掉头离开了轨道，所以我必须请求你的协助，把我的队伍带到你的船上。只要我们抵达有其他虚空舰的世界或星站，我们就不再叨扰。盗取什一税的人此刻正逍遥法外，我们绝不能死在这里。”
languages.original_text: "Speaking of shuttles, the ship we hired has turned tail and left orbit, so I must turn to you with a request: take my squad aboard, and we will disembark on the first world or station with access to a voidship. We cannot die here while whoever stole the tithe is enjoying their freedom."

traits.locale_text: “说到穿梭机，我们雇佣的飞船已经掉头离开了轨道，所以我必须请求你的协助，把我的队伍带到你的船上。只要我们抵达有其他虚空舰的世界或星站，我们就不再叨扰。盗取什一税的人此刻正逍遥法外，我们绝不能死在这里。”

languages.text: 「シャトルの話に関して言えば、私たちが雇った船は尻尾を巻いて軌道を離れてしまいました。だからこそ、あなたにお願いせざるを得ないのです。私の部隊をあなたの船に乗せてほしいのです。そして、最初に立ち寄る惑星か、ヴォイドシップにアクセスできるステーションで降ろしてください。租税を奪った奴がのうのうと逃げ延びているというのに、こんな所で私たちが死ぬわけにはいきません」
languages.original_text: "Speaking of shuttles, the ship we hired has turned tail and left orbit, so I must turn to you with a request: take my squad aboard, and we will disembark on the first world or station with access to a voidship. We cannot die here while whoever stole the tithe is enjoying their freedom."

traits.locale_text: 「シャトルの話に関して言えば、私たちが雇った船は尻尾を巻いて軌道を離れてしまいました。だからこそ、あなたにお願いせざるを得ないのです。私の部隊をあなたの船に乗せてほしいのです。そして、最初に立ち寄る惑星か、ヴォイドシップにアクセスできるステーションで降ろしてください。租税を奪った奴がのうのうと逃げ延びているというのに、こんな所で私たちが死ぬわけにはいきません」

languages.text: "Mekik demişken kiraladığımız gemi, kuyruğunu kıstırıp yörüngeden ayrıldı. Bu yüzden sizden bir şey rica edeceğim. Mangamı geminize alın, bir uçsuz gemisine erişimi olan ilk gezegende veya istasyonda ineriz. Aşarı çalan her kimse elini kolunu sallaya sallaya gezinirken burada ölme lüksümüz yok."
languages.original_text: "Speaking of shuttles, the ship we hired has turned tail and left orbit, so I must turn to you with a request: take my squad aboard, and we will disembark on the first world or station with access to a voidship. We cannot die here while whoever stole the tithe is enjoying their freedom."

traits.locale_text: "Mekik demişken kiraladığımız gemi, kuyruğunu kıstırıp yörüngeden ayrıldı. Bu yüzden sizden bir şey rica edeceğim. Mangamı geminize alın, bir uçsuz gemisine erişimi olan ilk gezegende veya istasyonda ineriz. Aşarı çalan her kimse elini kolunu sallaya sallaya gezinirken burada ölme lüksümüz yok."
